# Add this badge to your README.md

[![CMake Multi-Platform](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/cppcliargs/actions/workflows/cmake-multi-platform.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/cppcliargs/actions/workflows/cmake-multi-platform.yml)

# Replace YOUR_USERNAME with your actual GitHub username

## Example:
If your repo is at https://github.com/tiit/cppcliargs
Then use:

[![CMake Multi-Platform](https://github.com/tiit/cppcliargs/actions/workflows/cmake-multi-platform.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tiit/cppcliargs/actions/workflows/cmake-multi-platform.yml)
